name: Vinay Hankare
title: Managing Partner and Lead Instructor
bio: Digital marketing strategist with 8+ years of experience scaling brands from startups to Fortune 500 companies. Specialized in AI-powered performance marketing and has trained 200+ successful marketers.

name: Aloke Bajpai
title: Partner and Instructor
bio: Senior marketing professional from top agencies with 10+ years in performance marketing and SEO. Brings real-world case studies and industry insights to our classroom sessions.
